Skill.Name: Attack
Skill.Text: With a powerful swipe of their claws the lycan attacks their victim. The skill Attack is an attack of power Attack+1. The damage it deals is equal to its power. Multiple attackers can use Attack to grapple a defender. See Grappled for details. The character must either be in Warg Form, Wolf Form or carrying a weapon to use Attack.

Effect.Quick: Attack for X damage.

Skill.Name: Backstab
Skill.Text: Unseen and unheard the skilled rogue can approach a victim and take the time necessary to ensure that the blow they strike is precise and effective. A character who is hidden or moving silently can perform a Backstab of power Attack+Backstab. The attacker gains the +3 bonus for attacking an unaware defender. The damage of this attack is equal to its power.

Effect.Quick: If unseen, attack for X damage.

Skill.Name: Ball Lightning
Skill.Text: By calling on the power of Arthur the character is able to summon a ball of pure lightning to attack their foes. The power of this skill is Ball Lightning. The character creates a Ball Lightning with level equal to the power of this skill.

Effect.Quick: Create a Ball Lightning with power X.

Skill.Name: Berserk
Skill.Text: Whipping themselves into a fury the character loses track of everything but inflicting pain on those around them. The power of this skill is Berserk. The character is Berserk for the result duration and cannot be stopped before this. Each turn the character must make a regular attack with the die type increased by two against a target. The character must target a conscious target so long as one exists, conscious friends included. If there are no conscious targets they must target unconscious but alive characters, alive friend included. If there are no unconscious characters they must target an object or dead character.

Effect.Quick: Must attack for result level turns.
When Berserk attack for X.

Skill.Name: Black Hole
Skill.Text: By calling on the power of Oxdoro the character is able to bend space in on itself creating a point in space that sucks everything towards it and crushes those inside. The power of this skill is Black Hole. The duration of this skill is the result duration and the radius of this skill is the result distance. At the start of their turn any character in the radius of this skill, including in the hole, may make a Endurance or Sprint. If the result of this check is less than the power of this skill then they are sucked to the centre of the hole. Any character in the hole may not use their Move Action for that turn. They also take damage equal to the result level of this skill which cannot be defended against. Note that if the caster is within the radius then they too can be sucked into the hole.

Effect.Quick: Create a black hole radius X that sucks objects in.

Skill.Name: Bless
Curse
Skill.Text: Calling on the power of Loreanna fortune favours someone in all they do. The power of the skill is Bless. The target character gains +2 to all skill checks or -2 to all skill checks in any skill that they have spent on. This skill lasts for the result duration. This effect is Divisible and so by reducing the duration the user can give a larger bonus or penalty to skill checks. Casting requires a Major Action.

Effect.Quick: Target gets +2 or -2 to all skills.

Skill.Name: Blink
Skill.Text: By calling on the power of Oxdoro the character can quickly bend space so as to travel a short distance without moving. If used as a defence the power of this skill is Dodge+Blink. If the power of the attack is equal to or less than this power then the attack deals no damage nor has any effect on the defender. If used as a method of travel the power of this skill is Blink. In this case the user may move a distance in metres equal to the power of the skill to any visible location. Casting requires a Minor Action.

Effect.Quick: If X at least attack, then no damage or effect.
Move a distance of up to X.

Skill.Name: Block
Skill.Text: With a quick response and powerful intent the defender can reduce the impact of any blow. Attacks can be defended with a power of Block. Any attack has its power reduced by the power of this skill. If the attack power is reduced to 0 then it also has no effect. If an attack targets multiple characters the attack power is only reduced to this defending character.

Effect.Quick: Reduce the power of an attack by X.

Skill.Name: Bloodlust
Skill.Text: Sadistically revelling in the misfortune of their target the character gains power as they attack their opponent. The power of the attack is Bloodlust. This attack deals damage equal to the power of the attack and gains equal to the result level of the attack after defense.

Effect.Quick: Attack for X. Gain 1 HP for each 2 damage done.

Skill.Name: Chain Lightning
Skill.Text: By calling on the power of Arthur the caster is able to channel energy to form a massive bolt of lightning that bounces between foes. The power of the attack is Chain Lightning. The caster determines the initial trajectory and can change this trajectory a number of times equal to the result level of the check changing only after hitting a target. Each time the bolt travels in a straight line and hits all characters it crosses. The total distance that the bolt travels is equal to the power of the skill in metres however will stop prior to this if it hits a wall or similarly grounded object. The bolt deals damage equal to its power to every creature it passes. Creatures can be hit by the same bolt more than once however they are only targeted by the attack once and so only need to defend once.

Effect.Quick: Attack for X. May re-target the result level number of times

Skill.Name: Channel Mana
Skill.Text: By calling on the power of Ird'ken the caster can sap the energies of their foes or provide energy to allies. The power of this skill is Channel Mana. If the target does not resist: the target loses the power in and the caster gains the power in ; or the target gains the power in and the caster loses the power in . If the target resists then the result level is exchanged instead. A character may not be reduced below 0 by this skill. However they may be raised above .

Effect.Quick: Exchange X MP from a target or power level MP if they resist.

Skill.Name: Charm
Confuse
Skill.Text: By calling on the power of Ird'ken the caster can bend the will of their target to their own or simply shatter it. When used to charm the power of this skill is Charm. If twice the power of this skill is greater than the of the target then the target is charmed. This means that the target will obey the caster as long as the caster does not require them to go against the principles or motivations of the target. Casting requires a Major Action. When used to confuse the power of this skill is Confuse. If twice the power of this skill is greater than the of the target then the target becomes confused and aggressive. While in this state the target will not see the difference between friend and foe, attacking the nearest target. If the attack is on a friend then the caster chooses which skill will be used. If the attack is on a foe then the target chooses which skill will be used. Casting requires a Major Action.

Effect.Quick: If 2X is at least target's MP they are charmed.
If 2X is at least target's MP they become confused, attacking characters randomly.

Skill.Name: Cleave
Skill.Text: With broad powerful strokes the attacker can engage multiple foes at once. The power of the attack is Cleave. The skill deals damage equal to its power to at most the result level number of adjacent characters.

Effect.Quick: Attack adjacent characters for X.

Skill.Name: Combo
Skill.Text: While appearing slow at first the attacker gains momentum and blow follows blow at last wreaking massive damage to any foolhardy enough to get in the attacker's way. If the attacker's last action was not a successful attack or they choose to restart the Combo the skill's power is Combo. The attack costs 0 and deals damage equal to its power. If the attacker's last action was a successful melee attack then the skill's power is Combo plus the result of the previous attack after defense. The attack costs 2 plus the cost of the last attack. The attack deals damage equal to its power. This means that the power and mana cost of the attack accumulates with successful attacks.

Effect.Quick: Attack for X costing 0 MP.
If last Major Action was a successful attack then attack for 'X+last result' and costing '2+last MP'.

Skill.Name: Control Undead
Skill.Text: By calling on the power of Innodi a character can bend the minds of creatures with abnormal life to their will. The power of the skill is Control Undead. This power can be split in any way among any number of undead creatures to change whose control they are under. The power required to control a creature not currently controlled is equal to the creature's power. If the creature is currently under control then twice the creature's power is required. If the creature is currently under control and only the creature's power is reached then the creature is no longer under anyones control. Casting requires a Major Action. Any controlled undead can be dismissed for 3. The character gains 1 for each undead dismissed in this way. Dismissing requires a Minor Action however any number of undead can be dismissed at once for 3.

Effect.Quick: Gain control of an undead/golem not under anyones control of level less than X.
Target undead/golem of level less than X is no longer under anyones control.

Skill.Name: Counter
Skill.Text: By using the attackers own strength against them the defender quickly turns the blow destined for them to the back to attacker themselves. The power of the skill is Counter+1. If this power is equal to or greater than the power of the melee attack then the attack deals no damage nor has any effect. In this case the attacker receives damage equal to the power of this skilll and any effects that the defender would have received. This damage is not considered an attack and so cannot be defended against. Counter may be used to defend an adjacent ally. This skill cannot be used to defend against projectile attacks.

Effect.Quick: If X is at least attack then take no damage and attacker takes X damage.

Skill.Name: Counter-spell
Skill.Text: By interjecting in the target's commune with their deity the character skilfully disrupts the flow of power towards themselves rendering the divine power completely ineffective. The power of this skill is Counter-spell. If this power is equal to or greater than the power of a spell just cast targeting the user then all effects of that spell do not occur. A countered spell still requires it's casting cost although no ongoing costs are required. Using this skill requires a Minor Action.

Effect.Quick: If X is at least spell power targeting the character then it is cancelled.

Skill.Name: Create Golem
Destroy Golem
Skill.Text: By calling on the power of Innodi a character can bring earth and fire to life to fight at their side. When creating a golem the power of this skill is Create Golem. The user can create a Golem of level up to the power of this skill. This effect is Divisible and so level of creature can be sacrificed for quantity of creatures. Casting requires a Major Action and a sufficient source of earth or fire dependant on the type of Golem. The casting creates the form so the earth or fire do not have to be shaped by hand. For example a character with a check of 9 can create one Golem with level up to 9. They could also create two Golems with level up to 4 or 3 Golems with level up to 2. This skill costs 1 to sustain for each Golem. When destroying a golem the power of this skill is Destroy Golem. The golem loses power equal to the power of this skill. If the golem falls below 0 or reaches power 0 then it is destroyed.

Effect.Quick: Create a golem of power X. Divide power to add a golem. Cost to sustain is equal to number of golems.
Remove X power from a summoned Golem.

Skill.Name: Devour
Skill.Text: Taking advantage of the power of a fallen foe the character consumes their body to restore their own power. When used on an incapacitated target the target causes Devour Deep Wounds. For each Deep Wound the target sustains the character gains 1. Devouring requires a Major Action.

Effect.Quick: Gain X HP and deal X deep wound to incapacitated foe.

Skill.Name: Deflect
Skill.Text: Spotting weakness in a character's attack the defender swiftly parries and opens the attacker for a quick riposte. The power of the defence is Deflect+1. If this power is equal to or greater than the power of the melee attack then it deals no damage nor has any effect and the attacker is Stunned for 1 turn. Note that Tough Fighter does not affect this skill. Deflect may be used to defend an adjacent ally. This skill cannot be used to defend against projectile attacks.

Effect.Quick: If X is at least attack power then take no damage and attacker is stunned for 1 turn.

Skill.Name: Divine Arrow
Skill.Text: By calling on the power of Arthur the caster summons an arrow from the ether and fires it at its hapless victim. The power of the attack is Divine Arrow. It deals damage equal to it's power.

Effect.Quick: Attack for X.

Skill.Name: Divine Contract
Skill.Text: By calling on the power of Ird'ken the caster binds their will into the fate of their target. The power of this skill is equal to its level. A willing target must complete a goal specified by the caster. If they fail this goal they immediately receive power5 Deep Wounds to a maximum of the target's . While this skill is a spell it is unaffected by Counter-spell, Spell Shield, Inversion and Steal Spell.

Effect.Quick: Willing target must obey contract. If they fail to roll for X and they take X deep wounds.

Skill.Name: Dodge
Skill.Text: With a swift and quick step the defender avoids even the most massive attack. The power of this skill is Dodge+1. If this power is equal to or greater than the attack power the it deals no damage nor has any effect on the defender.

Effect.Quick: If X is at least attack power then take no damage.

Skill.Name: Endurance
Skill.Text: This character is strong and has learnt to endure even the harshest conditions. The character can attempt a dead lift of any object with power equal to Endurance. If the weight of the object is at most three times the result weight then it can be lifted. Unskilled actions can be performed with a power of Endurance+1. Any skill with an icon requires this skill.

Effect.Quick: Lift objects up to three times the result weight.
Unskilled Str action with power X.

Skill.Name: Extra HP
Skill.Text: The character is healthy beyond normal bounds. Each level of this skill increases the character's maximum by three. As death occurs at - this skill increases the range that a character will remain unconscious but not dead.

Effect.Quick: Character gains +X to max HP.

Skill.Name: Extra MP
Skill.Text: This character has willpower beyond normal bounds. Each level of this skill increases the character's maximum by three.

Effect.Quick: Character gains +X to max MP

Skill.Name: Fear
Anger
Skill.Text: By calling on the power of Ird'ken the caster can instill fear into a single target or make a character unquestionably the target of attack. When used to cause fear this skill has power Fear. If twice the power of the skill is greater than the of the target then the target becomes afraid of the caster and may not attack them under any circumstances and will try to avoid them as much a possible. If the power of the skill is greater than twice the of the target then the target will attempt to flee. Casting requires a Major Action. When used to anger this skill has power Anger. To use this skill a single character is chosen and the skill targets all characters who are opposed to the chosen character. All targeted characters with less than twice the power of this skill must attack the chosen character. The attackers may use any attack skill they wish and if it is impossible for them to attack the target they may take whatever action they wish. Casting requires a Major Action.

Effect.Quick: If 2X is at least targets MP then target fears the caster.
If 2X is at least targets MP then target attacks a scapegoat.

Skill.Name: Fireball
Skill.Text: By calling on the power of Arthur the caster is able to channel energy to form a ball of fire which is then hurled at its hapless victims exploding on contact. The power of this skill is Fireball. This skill deals damage equal to its power and has radius equal to half its result distance. A character that receives at least 5 damage from this skill is On Fire with power equal to the power of this skill.

Effect.Quick: Attack anyone in radius of half result distance for X. If X is at least 5 then on fire for X as well.

Skill.Name: Flight
Skill.Text: By calling on the power of Oxdoro the caster is able to defy gravity. The power of this skill is Flight. Instead of a regular Move Action the target may move the result distance in any direction. This movement is affected by wind.

Effect.Quick: Fly instead of move up to result distance.

Skill.Name: Focus
Skill.Text: While the physical limits of the character have not changed through force of willpower a character maintains consciousness while badly injured. For each level in this skill the range in which a character remains conscious is increased by 3. A character will die by falling below - regardless of this skill. Regain consciousness rolls are unaffected by this skill. A character with this skill still needs to return to positive health and make a regular regain conscoiusness roll once unconscious.

Effect.Quick: Stay conscious until -X HP

Skill.Name: Fog
Wind
Skill.Text: By calling on the power of Innodi the caster can summon a great fog concealing all or a great wind. If attempting to create a fog the power of the skill is Fog. The radius of the fog is the skills power in metres. Any character attempting to move more than one meter in a turn must make a Sprint roll greater than the power of the fog or fall over. Ranged non-area effect attacks cannot be made and mêlée attacks are reduced by the power of the fog. Every character in the fog gains the power of the skill in Stealth. The fog takes one turn to dissipate. It costs no mana for this turn but has full effect during that turn. If attempting to create a great wind the power of the skill is Fog. The radius of the wind is equal to its power. Any character in the blast must make a Sprint check and if this roll is less than the power of the wind they will fall over after travelling a distance in metres equal to the check. Any type of fog in the area of the blast will have its power reduced by the power of the wind to a minimum of zero at which the fog has completely dissipated.

Effect.Quick: Create a fog of strength X.
Create a wind of strength X.

Skill.Name: Haste
Slow
Skill.Text: By calling on the power of Oxdoro the caster can create a pocket of space containing a single character where the flow of time is altered. The power of this skill is Haste. The target gains +1 or -1 to Speed for the result duration. This effect is Divisible and so the duration may be halved to add an additional +1 or -1 to speed. Casting requires a Major Action.

Effect.Quick: Target character gains +1 or -1 to their speed. Divide to add an additional +1 or -1.

Skill.Name: Heal
Hurt
Skill.Text: By calling on the power of Innodi the caster can directly heal the life force or drain the life force from a creature. The power of the skill is Heal. This skill can increase or reduce the of a character by the power of the skill in . This skill is not an attack skill and hence when it is used to reduce a characters the target cannot use a defence skill. Casting requires a Major Action. Note that this skill can raise a character's above .

Effect.Quick: Target gains or loses X HP.

Skill.Name: Heal Deep Wounds
Cause Deep Wounds
Skill.Text: By calling on the power of Innodi the caster can heal even the most dire of wounds, or cause them. The power of this skill is Heal Deep Wounds. This skill can reduce the number of Deep Wounds by its result level or alternatively can cause cause a number of Deep Wounds equal to its result level . If used to heal Deep Wounds and the power of this skill is greater than the number Deep Wounds then the remaining power is used to heal regular wounds. The casting time is around one minute.

Effect.Quick: Target gains or loses result level deep wounds

Skill.Name: Hold Person
Free Person
Skill.Text: By calling on the power of Oxdoro the caster can magically bind creature in one spot. The power of this skill is Hold Person. This power lasts for the result duration. The target can no longer move and so on their turn cannot move, take a Major Action nor any action that requires movement. They still get a Minor Action however they may not use it to perform any physical action apart from speaking or casting spells. This skill requires a Major Action to cast and then a Major Action each following turn to sustain it. Alternatively any target character now has a normal movement phase and Major Action whether or not another skill restricts them. This does not provide any effect on an unconscious character however does grant a Major Action to someone under the effects of a Slow spell. This skill requires a Major Action to sustain it.

Effect.Quick: Target has no Major Action, or if they have no Major Action they now have one.

Skill.Name: Inferno
Skill.Text: By calling on the power of Arthur the character creates an explosion of flame emanating from the character in all directions. The power of this skill is Inferno. The radius of this effect is equal to the power of this skill in metres, excluding the caster, and the damage is equal to its power. Anyone who takes damage from this skill is On Fire with power equal to the power of this skill. Casting requires a Major Action.

Effect.Quick: Attack everyone in a radius of X for X and they are on fire for X.

Skill.Name: Impenetrable Field
Skill.Text: By calling on the power of Arthur the caster creates a barrier that protects them from any harm. The power of this skill is Impenetrable Field. The field has equal to the power of the skill. The field has the skill Block at the level of half the power of this skill. When any attacker targets the character they target the field instead. When the field drops to 0 it is destroyed and any remaining damage targets the character instead. During the Refresh and Regenerate phase of Combat the field loses 1. Casting requires a Major Action.

Effect.Quick: Gain a field with HP of X and Block at level X/2

Skill.Name: Increase Size
Reduce Size
Skill.Text: Calling on the power of Oxdoro the character can warp the size of any creature or object. The power of the skill is Alter Size. The target either gains a size class or loses a size class, decided by the user. The duration of the skill is equal to the result duration. This effect is Divisible so by sacrificing duration the character can add or subtract an additional size class. Casting requires a Major Action. For rules on size classes and effects see Altered Size for details.

Effect.Quick: Target gains or loses a size class. Divide to add or lose an additional class.

Skill.Name: Increase Stat
Reduce Stat
Skill.Text: By calling on the power of Loreanna a character suddenly becomes more powerful in a specific way. The power of this skill is Change Stat. The caster chooses either , , or and the target gains an extra die level or loses a die level to that stat for a duration equal to the result duration. This effect is Divisible so by reducing the duration the caster can increase the number of dice levels gained or lost. Casting requires a Major Action.

Effect.Quick: Target gains +1 or -1 to either Str, Dex, Int or Fai. Divide for an additional +1 or -1.

Skill.Name: Increase Stats
Reduce Stats
Skill.Text: By calling on the power of Loreanna a character suddenly becomes more powerful in every way. The power of this skill is Change Stats. The target gains an extra die level or loses a die level to all of , , and for a duration equal to the result duration. This effect is Divisible so by reducing the duration the caster can increase the number of dice levels gained or lost. Casting requires a Major Action.

Effect.Quick: Target gains +1 or -1 to all of Str, Dex, Int and Fai. Divide for an additional +1 or -1.

Skill.Name: Initiative
Skill.Text: Ever ready for action the character anticipates the actions of others. This skill is used at the start of combat. The power is Initiative+1. The turn order of characters is determined by the highest power of this skill. If there is a tie then then the characters that tied reroll to see who goes first amongst themselves.

Effect.Quick: Roll for X at start of combat. Turn order is descending X.

Skill.Name: Inversion
Skill.Text: By carefully disrupting the communication between a caster and their deity they can, in some way, reverse the effect of a spell. The power of this skill is Inversion. If the power of this skill is equal to or greater than the power of a spell just cast targeting the user then the spell targets the caster instead or a spell that is invertible uses the inverse ability but not both. The caster still pays the casting cost but the character may, if they choose to, pay the ongoing costs to increase its duration in the same way that the original caster could. Casting requires a Minor Action.

Effect.Quick: If X is at least the power of a spell then either its effect is inverted or it targets the caster instead.

Skill.Name: Invisibility
Locate
Skill.Text: By calling on the power of Loreanna the caster can either detect the presence of an object or conceal it from view. If trying to conceal a character or object the power is Invisibility. If it is an object it reduces the power of any Observation check targeting the object by the power of this skill. Note that this skill does not affect Sense checks. If a character is targeted they gain the power of this skill to their Stealth skill regardless of whether they have spent points in that skill or not. Casting requires a Major Action. If trying to find a character or object the power of this skill is Locate. The surrounds of an object are known at a radius equal to the power of this skill in metres. If the character is within this radius they know the exact location of the object otherwise they only know the direction of the object. Casting requires a Minor Action.

Effect.Quick: Target gains +X to the result of any stealth rolls
Find an object within a radius of result distance.

Skill.Name: Light
Darkness
Skill.Text: By calling on the power of Loreanna the caster can channel light either shinning with divine light or sucking the light out of the environment. This skill can, without a check or cost, produce sufficient light to see by under any non-divine conditions. Casting requires a Minor Action. The power of this skill Light. The caster can increase or reduce the light in the current location by one for a duration equal to the power of this skill in turns. See Environmental Light for details. This effect is Divisible so by reducing the duration the caster can increase or decrease the light further. Casting requires a Major Action.

Effect.Quick: Increase or reduce light level by one. Divide to add or reduce by a further one.

Skill.Name: Lightning Bolt
Skill.Text: By calling on the power of Arthur the caster is able to channel energy to form a massive bolt of lightning to strike their foes. The power of the skill is Lightning Bolt. The path of the bolt is a line starting at the character and will continue for the power of the skill in metres or until it hits a wall or similarly grounded object. Every character in this path takes damage equal to the power of this skill.

Effect.Quick: Attack for X everyone in a line of length X.

Skill.Name: Locks and Traps
Skill.Text: The character is especially skilled at mechanisms. This provides them the ability to manipulate mechanical locks and traps as well as the experience necessary to observe the location of traps. If the character is attempting to pick a mechanical lock the power of this skill is Locks and Traps. If the power of the skill is greater than or equal to the power of a lock then it is unlocked. Only one attempt to pick a lock is permitted and it requires a Major Action. If the character is attempting to force a mechanical lock the power of this skill is Locks and Traps+2. If the power of the skill is greater than or equal to the power of a lock then it is unlocked. If the power of the skill is less than the power of the lock then the lock is broken. A broken lock cannot be picked nor forced nor unlocked with the correct key. Forcing a lock requires a Major Action. When the Observation skill is used to search for traps the power of the skill becomes Observation+Locks and Traps. If the character is attempting to disarm or set a trap the power of this skill is Locks and Traps. A sufficiently bad power when attempting to disarm a trap will set it off. To set a trap the right tools are needed and the power of the trap is equal to the power of this skill. Typically setting a trap takes around ten minutes.

Effect.Quick: Unlock a lock of strength up to X.
Force a lock of strength up to X.
Arm or disarm a trap of strength up to X.

Skill.Name: Lore
Skill.Text: A character with this skill is particularly knowledgable when it comes to divine lore. The character can attempt to remember knowledge with a cheock of power Lore. Having access to a library or similar source will provide bonuses to this check.

Effect.Quick: Know about lore with power X.

Skill.Name: Lunge
Skill.Text: With great power the character near instantly closes the distance to a foe landing on them with a crushing blow. A character starts a lunge in the same way they jump using the Sprint skill except they use this skill for the roll. They may end the leap with an attack. If so they may make a basic Attack roll and add the Lunge roll to the damage. They may not add more damage than is one result distance further than they jumped. For example if a character lunges 5m then one result distance further is the result range 6-10 and so the added damage cannot be more than 10. A character who chooses a to Lunge may move as though they spent their Major Action as a Move Action. A character may not Lunge by first moving away from a target and then towards.

Effect.Quick: Lunge at someone gaining Lunge plus a standard attack to anyone within the result distance.

Skill.Name: Observation
Skill.Text: This character has honed their ability to see or hear even the smallest of details. The character can actively or passively noticing something visual or aural with a power of Observation+1. They can perform unskilled actions can be performed with a power of Observation+1. Any skill with an icon requires this skill.

Effect.Quick: Observe with a power of X.
Unskilled Int action with power X.

Skills.Skill:
Permanence Phase Shift Fai 3 Oxdoro Mechanist
By calling the power of Oxdoro the character can take temporary energies and make them permanent. The power of this skill is Permanence. If the power of this skill is at least the power of a spell with ongoing mana costs the spell no longer requires the ongoing cost. However the caster of the ongoing spell reduces their by twice the ongoing cost. If the skill required a Major Action to sustain it now requires a Minor Action. If the skill required a Minor Action to sustain it now requires no action to sustain. t
Permanence 5 If X is at least the power of a spell, the caster gets -2X to max MP but pays no more MP.

Skill.Name: Phase Shift
Skill.Text: By calling the power of Oxdoro the character can slide slightly outside the realm of existence. The power of this skill is Phase Shift. The user can becomes Ethereal for the result duration. Casting requires a Minor Action.

Effect.Quick: Become Ethereal.

Skill.Name: Poison
Cure Poison
Skill.Text: The character has an intimate knowledge of poisons and their cures. When a character makes a successful standard Attack the defender is poisoned with power Poison. If the character is using a piercing weapon then they have a bonus of +2 to their Poison roll. Alternatively a character may use a Major Action to cure a poison with power of Poison. If the character is currently under the effects of a poison then the poison is reduced in power by the power of this skill. If a character is not under the effects of a poison but was poisoned within the last hour then the character can counteract the long term effects of a poison. For example the Deep Wounds caused by a poison.

Effect.Quick: After a successful attack target is poisoned for X.
Reduce the strength of a poison by X or heal X deep wounds made by poison.

Skill.Name: Poison Cloud
Skill.Text: By calling on the power of Innodi the character can summon a poisonous cloud that saps the energy from any creature caught inside. The power of this skill is Poison Cloud. The radius of the cloud is the result distance. A Poison Cloud has all the properties of Fog. Any turn that a character ends while in the cloud must make a Endurance or Sense check. If a character fails this check they are effected by Poison with a power equal to the power of the cloud.

Effect.Quick: Create a cloud with strength X that poisons for X to anyone caught inside.

Skill.Name: Poison Dart
Skill.Text: By calling on the power of Innodi the character summons an ethereal dart laced with poison. The power of this attack is Poison Dart. The target becomes Poisoned with power equal to the power of this attack.

Effect.Quick: Attack for X. If successful it poisons for X.

Skill.Name: Portal
Skill.Text: By calling on the power of Oxdoro the character is able to link disparate places in space to allow thoroughfare between them. When used to create a first portal this skill always succeeds and required a Minor Action. When used to create a portal that links to another portal the power of this skill is Portal. If the portal to be created is no further than two to the power of this skill in metres to an existing portal then the creation succeeds and the portals are linked as well as any other portals currently linked to the existing portal. Casting requires a Major Action. Any character may move into any portal and exit at any of its linked portals. The ongoing cost of this skill is equal to the number of linked portals beyond the first. The character may at any time choose to close all the portals or for a Minor Action close a particular portal. Closing a portal does not affect the linked nature of any remaining portals no matter how they were originally created and linked. Portals cannot close while objects are passing through them.

Effect.Quick: Create the first portal.
Create a portal and link to an existing portal within 2 to the X metres. Ongoing cost is one less than the number of portals.

Skill.Name: Precision Attack
Skill.Text: The character has excellent knowledge of all creatures weak points and the training to strike at them. The power of this attack is Attack+Precision Attack. The damage is equal to the power of the attack. They may use a Minor Action to get an additional +1 to their skill check.

Effect.Quick: Attack for X. Spend a Minor Action to get +1.

Skill.Name: Raise Undead
Hurt Undead
Skill.Text: By calling on the power of Innodi the character gives life to those who are recently departed. The power of this skill is Raise Undead. The caster can raise up to the power of this skill in levels of creatures who have recently died to create Undead warriors. No matter how many undead are raised the ongoing cost is always 1. Any controlled undead can be dismissed for 3. The caster gains 1 for each undead dismissed in this way.

Effect.Quick: Raise an undead with power X. Divide to raise an additional undead.

Skill.Name: Random Fate
Skill.Text: The caster puts the fate of a character in the hands of Loreanna The power of the attack is Chaos Bolt. The fate of the character is given to Loreanna who decides their fate dependant on the result level of this skill after defense is calculated. 0: +1 to all skills for 1 turn. 1: Nothing happens. 2: Knocked Prone. 3: -1 die type to all skills for 2 turns. 4: -1 to Speed for 6 turns. 5: Stunned for 5 turns. 6: The target dies. 7: The caster decides their fate.

Effect.Quick: Randomly determine a character's fate.

Skill.Name: Redirect
Skill.Text: By calling on the power of Arthur the character is able to take a projectile and fire it back to its origin. The power of this skill is Redirect. If the power of the projectile attack is equal to or less than this power then the attack targets the attacker instead. This skill may be used to redirect a projectile targeting another character. The effect is the same however a Minor Action is required if used in this way. This skill may only be used on projectile attacks.

Effect.Quick: If X is at least a projectile attack then the attack targets the attacker.

Skill.Name: Refresh
Skill.Text: The character has great propensity to renew mental energies. The character's refresh rate is equal to the level of this skill minus 5.

Effect.Quick: Target gains MP at a rate of X.

Skill.Name: Regenerate
Skill.Text: The character has great propensity to renew physical health. The character's regenerate rate is equal to half the level of this skill minus 5.

Effect.Quick: Target gains HP at a rate of X.

Skill.Name: Sense
Skill.Text: This character has honed their ability to sense to even minor changes in the world around them. Actively or passively noticing something non-visual and non-aural with power Sense+1. Unskilled actions can be performed with a power of Sense+1. Any skill with a icon requires this skill.

Effect.Quick: Sense with a power of X.
Unskilled Fai action with power X.

Skill.Name: Sleep
Wake
Skill.Text: By calling on the power of Ird'ken the caster can gain control over their state of consciousness. If trying to cause a character to sleep the power of this skill is Sleep. The duration of this skill is equal ot its power in turns. While under the influence of this skill the targeted character has their lowered by power of this skill for the purposes of consciousness and unconsciousness. Note that this does not affect at what a character dies, only when they fall unconscious or regain consciousness. Casting requires a Major Action. If trying to wake an unconscious character the power is Wake. For the duration of this skill the character has their raised by the power of this skill for the purposes of consciousness and unconsciousness. Note this does not affect at what a character dies, only when they fall unconscious or regain consciousness. Casting requires a Major Action. An unaware target who remains conscious may make a Notice to see if they notice the effect. If the notice power is at least the power of the skill then they notice.

Effect.Quick: Target gains or loses X to their HP for the purposes of consciousness

Skill.Name: Spell Shield
Skill.Text: By interjecting in the target's commune with their deity the character skilfully disrupts the flow of power rendering the divine power completely ineffective. The power of this skill is Spell Shield. If the power of this skill is equal to or greater than the power of any spell just cast then all the effects of that spell do not occur. A countered spell stills requires it's casting cost although no ongoing costs are required. Casting requires a Minor Action.

Effect.Quick: If X is at least the power of a spell it is countered.

Skill.Name: Sprint
Skill.Text: This character is particularly agile and can move with grace and speed. In combat the character can move a number of metres each turn dependant on the result level of the level of the skill. Note that armour can affect movement speed. Outside of combat the character can move the same distance but each second. A character may use movement speed to jump horizontally. If so they make a Sprint and the result distance is the maximum number of metres they can jump. A run up will help a character to jump. A character may not jump more than two metres further than their run up. A character may use movement speed to jump vertically. If so they make a Sprint and the result distance halved indicates the maximum number of metres they can jump. A run up does not help a character jump vertically. Unskilled actions can be performed with a power of Sprint+1. Any skill with an icon requires this skill.

Effect.Quick: The character can jump the result distance horizontally or half that vertically.
Unskilled Dex action with power X.

Skill.Name: Stealth
Skill.Text: By staying in the shadows and sensing others movements around them the character can remain unseen. If hiding the power of this skill is Stealth+2. As long as this power is larger then a passive Observation check by those around them they remain hidden. For the duration that the user remains hidden only one roll is made. Hiding requires a Minor Action. If stealthily moving the power of this skill is Stealth+1. As long as this power is larger then a passive Observation check by those around them they remain hidden. For the duration that the user remains hidden only one roll is made. While moving this skill costs 1 to sustain. A character may stop moving to avoid paying this cost. Stealthy movement requries a Minor Action. If picking someone's pocket this skill has power of Stealth. If this is greater than a passive Observation check by the target then the item is stolen. This action costs 5 and requires a Major Action.

Effect.Quick: Hide with power X.
Move stealthily with power X.
Pick pocket with power X.

Skill.Name: Steal Spell
Skill.Text: By incredible skill the character interjects into a caster's commune with their deity they gain complete control of the spell, wielding it in any way they choose. The power of this skill is Steal Spell. If this is greater than or equal to the power of a spell that has just been cast then the spell targets whoever the character wishes, if invertible they may invert the spell and if Divisible they may divide it. The power of the spell becomes the power of this skill. The casting cost is paid by the caster but the user may pay the ongoing costs to increase its duration in the same way that the original caster could. This skill requires a Minor Action.

Effect.Quick: If X is at least the power of a spell it becomes power X cast by this character.

Skill.Name: Stun Attack
Skill.Text: The character moves with quick strikes that, while doing no damage, confounds the target and stuns them for a short period. This attack has a power of Stun Attack. The power of this attack is reduced by the defence skill used regardless of which defence skill is used. The defender is stunned for a number of turns equal to the remaining result level.

Effect.Quick: Attack for X. All defence skills reduce X. Stun for result level turns.

Skill.Name: Stunning Bolt
Skill.Text: By calling on the power of Loreanna the character is able to summon a divine bolt which confounds whomever it strikes. The power of this attack is Stunning Bolt. The power of this attack is reduced by the defence skill regardless of which skill is used. The target is Stunned for a number of turns equal to the remaining result level.

Effect.Quick: Attack for X. All defence skills reduce X. Stun for result level turns.

Skill.Name: Swarm of Rats
Skill.Text: By calling on the power of Innodi the character is able to call on small creatures to attack their foes. The power of this skill is Swarm of Rats. The first turn nothing happens. Before the characters next turn a number of rats is summoned equal to the result level of this skill. Each rat has 1 and attacks for 2 slashing damage each turn. This damage ignores shields. This skill costs 1 to sustain for each result level of rats remaining, including the first turn. For example: if there are 7 rats left the skill costs 3. Casting requires a Major Action. The entire swarm is controlled with a single simple command such as to attack a particular character or to congregate in a particular area. If the sustain cost is not paid then the results are unpredictable. Most animals will disperse but some may attack random targets. In urban environments rats are exclusively summoned. In other environments many other small species may instead appear. Such as other small mammals, lizards, snakes or even small birds. Their stats remain the same no matter what small animals are summoned.

Effect.Quick: Summon X rats. Each rat has 1 and attacks for 2 damages ignoring shields.

Skill.Name: Switch
Skill.Text: By calling on the power of Loreanna the character is able to channel the energy of others to transfer each to the other. The power of this skill is Switch. This skill fails if the distance between the targets in metres is greater than the power of this skill. This skill also fails if the target is unwilling and the difference between the targets' is greater than the power of this skill. The targets are now each standing where the other was standing. Also their has switched. Casting requires a Major Action. Note that this skill may raise a character's above their .

Effect.Quick: If X is greater than the HP difference and distance of two characters then they swap position and HP.

Skill.Name: Taunt
Skill.Text: This character has the ability to provoke their opponents into relentlessly attacking. The power of this skill is Taunt. Any opposing character within a radius equal to the power of this skill in metres and less than twice the power of this skill must attack this character in their next turn. Taunting requires a Minor Action but the character may use defence skills as normal this turn.

Effect.Quick: All characters with at most 2X MP must attack the character.

Skill.Name: Telekinesis
Skill.Text: By calling on the power of Oxdoro the caster can deftly manoeuvre small objects or crudely move large objects from a distance. If used to manipulate small objects this skill has power equal to its level without a check. Any object of weight less than the result weight can be telekinetically moved with precision. Delicate movement requries a Major Action but no . If used to crudely move large objects the power of this skill is given by Telekinesis. The mana cost is 5. The distance that an object is moved is the result distance times the result weight divided by the object weight. For example: if a 60kg boulder is to be moved and the result of the check is 8 then the object can be moved 6 times 30 divided by 60 or 3 metres. If a creature is thrown in the above way into a wall or similar barrier then they are stunned for a number of turns equal to the extra distance they would have been thrown. For example a 80kg character is thrown with a Telekinesis check of power 12 and so would be thrown 4m. They hit a wall after 1m and so they are then stunned for 3 turns. Gross movement requires a Major Action.

Effect.Quick: Precisely move objects of up to the result weight.
Move a large object a distance in metres equal to the result distance times result weight divided by object weight.

Skill.Name: Track
Skill.Text: By careful examination of the environment via visual and olfactory cues a character is able to track a creature path over any terrain. The power of the skill is Track. The result level provides how deftly the character can follow the track. A Basic Pass albeit slowly. With a Pass the track can be followed at more or less walking pace. With a Prodigious Pass the track can be followed at a running pace. Tracking requires a Major Action for each turn spent tracking. If the character wishes to track using only a Minor Action they track with a result level one lower. Tracking becomes harder under certain circumstances. The tracking roll has the result reduced by 1 for each day that has passed since the trail was made. Soft ground imposes no penalty. However harder terrain will reduce the result level.

Effect.Quick: Track with power X.

Skill.Name: Unlock
Lock
Skill.Text: By calling on the power of Ird'ken the caster is able to open any passage or bar any door. If used to unlock a divine or mechanical lock the power of this skill is given by Unlock. If the power of this skill is greater than the power of a lock then it is unlocked. Casting requires a Minor Action. If used to lock a barrier, such as a door or chest, the power of this skill is Unlock. Such a barrier becomes locked with a divine lock of power equal to the power of this skill. If the barrier already has a divine lock then the power of the divine lock becomes equal to the maximum of its current power and the power of this skill. Casting requires a Major Action. Locks can be both mechanical and divine. This skill attempts to unlock both with a single roll and can succeed to unlock one but fail to unlock the other. Multiple characters can pool their rolls when attempting either to lock or unlock a barrier.

Effect.Quick: Lock or unlock magically for strength X.

Skill.Name: Void
Skill.Text: By calling on the power of Ird'ken the power of any ongoing divine effect is sapped. The power of this skill is Void. Any ongoing divine effect within a radius equal to the power of this skill in metres has its power reduced by the power of this skill to a minimum of zero. If the power of a divine skill reaches zero it is immediately cancelled and no ongoing effects or costs are applied. Casting requires a Major Action. This spell may be continued. If so then every spell either cast within the Void or targeted into the Void has its power reduced by the power of the original Void check. Ongoing costs are 2 and a Minor Action. This skill has no effect on a Divine Contract unless it specifically targets the contract in which case it does not have the above effect. The contract is immediately activated however it uses Void2 fewer dice. A character may not maliciously use this skill on a Divine Contract in an attempt to trigger this effect. Note that this effect applies to the effects of a spell and not casters. This means that the targets must be in the radius of this skill and not the casters. This skill can affect some characters but not others from a single spell and the caster of the original spell may choose to pay the ongoing cost for the remaining targets.

Effect.Quick: Cancel ongoing effects and new spells with power less than X.

Skill.Name: Will of Arthur
Skill.Text: As a devout follower of Arthur the caster is able to draw extreme divine power from Arthur. They can increase the potency of all attack or defence abilities in their presence. The power of this skill is Will of Arthur. The duration of this skill is equal to the result duration. The caster chooses either attack or defence. For each nearby character the caster decides to increase or reduce the die type of attack or defense, as chosen earlier, of the character. If this skill is inverted then attack is swapped with defense and each character swaps whether it was increased or decreased. This skill is divisible. The caster may halve its power to increase the number of die types increased and reduced. This skill is unaffected by Counter-spell, Spell Shield, Inversion, Steal Spell and Void. Casting requires a Major Action.

Effect.Quick: Add or remove X to all attack skills, defence skills or both.

Skill.Name: Will of Innodi
Skill.Text: As a devout follower of Innodi the caster is able to draw extreme divine power from Innodi. They can channel life force in or out of the surrounding environment healing or grievously harming those around them. The power of this skill is Will of Innodi. For each nearby character the caster chooses that that character either heals or sustains a number of Deep Wounds equal to the result level of this skilll. This skill is unaffected by Counter-spell, Spell Shield, Inversion, Steal Spell and Void. Casting requires a Major Action.

Effect.Quick: All characters gain or lose X deep wounds.

Skill.Name: Will of Ird'ken
Skill.Text: As a devout follower of Ird'ken the caster is able to draw extreme divine power from Ird'ken to cause chaos or order. The power of this skill is Follower of Ird'ken. The duration of this skill is the result duration. Whenever each nearby character in the effect performs a Major Action they instead pick the result level number of skills. The caster then chooses which skill the target actually performs. The target still chooses the specifics of the skill they use such as targets. If the target does not have sufficient skills that have Major Actions then they pick as many skills as they can. This skill is unaffected by Counter-spell, Spell Shield, Inversion, Steal Spell and Void. Casting requires a Major Action.

Effect.Quick: Choose targets' Major Actions from a list numbering result level skills.

Skill.Name: Will of Loreanna
Skill.Text: As a devout follower of Loreanna the caster is able to draw extreme divine power from Loreanna. Loreanna imparts skill and knowledge to an individual. The power of this skill is Will of Loreanna. The duration of this skill is the power duration. The target gains one result level to any ability used or the skills Locks and Traps, Lore, Observation, Sense and Stealth. If the target is untrained in the ability they also reduce the untrained penalty by one level. This effect is Divisible and so by reducing the duration the caster can increase the number of targets. This skill is unaffected by Counter-spell, Spell Shield, Inversion, Steal Spell and Void. Casting requires a Major Action.

Effect.Quick: Target gains +1 to abilties and reduces untrained penalties. Divide to increase number of targets.

Skill.Name: Will of Oxdoro
Skill.Text: As a devout follower of Oxdoro the caster is able to draw extreme divine power from Oxdoro. They can stop time for everyone except themselves bringing objects and creatures back to life by their touch. The power of this skill is Will of Oxdoro. Time is frozen for the result duration of the check. Any character may make a Will of Oxdoro to see if they are frozen. The caster and any character with a check at least the power of this skill is not frozen. Any character or object touched by a character not frozen is no longer frozen. A character may use a Minor Action to touch another character or object or a Major Action to touch up to two characters or objects. A frozen character does not get a chance to defend when frozen. However this counts as touching the defending character and so they are no longer frozen. This skill is unaffected by Counter-spell, Spell Shield, Inversion, Steal Spell and Void. Casting requires a Major Action.

Effect.Quick: Freeze everything but characters with the Will of Oxdoro. Anything they touch unfreezes.

Skill.Name: Will of Travaer
Skill.Text: As a devout follower of Travaer the caster is able to draw extreme divine power from Travaer. The caster can invert any spell or skill used in their presence. The power of this skill is Will of Travaer. The duration of this skill is equal to its result duration. Any invertible spell that is cast nearby is affected by this skill. The caster of this skill may invert the spell at their discretion. If the invertible spell has multiple targets then the effect is inverted for all targets. This only affects newly cast spells and does not affect ongoing effects. This can affect the will of other deities. This skill is unaffected by Counter-spell, Spell Shield, Inversion, Steal Spell and Void. Casting requires a Major Action. While this skill does not have a divine token, it is a spell.

Effect.Quick: Caster gets the chance to invert any invertible spell.
